Name: Landmarks, Claremont House: 1640 Anthony Avenue, Bronx (C 250221 ZMX).
Title: Application number C 250221 ZMX (Claremont House: 1640 Anthony Avenue) submitted by the Department of Housing Preservation and Development, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 3d, changing from an R7-1 District to an R8 District, Borough of the Bronx, Community District 4, Council District 15.
BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Sitings and Dispositions

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
